p.b: Note: All answers are marked as "Correct"

li.p: What does it mean when we say that "the computer walks through the sequence executing some computation"?

choicegroup.choice: The computer tests each instruction to ensure it will not harm the circuitry.
The computer executes the instructions in strict, linear sequence, just like walking in a straight line.
The computer executes the instructions mostly in a linear sequence, except sometimes it jumps to a different place in the sequence.
The computer slowly executes instructions so that we can follow its progress, rather than running a program at full speed.

li.p: For the expression 'a'*3 what is the type of the value returned?

choicegroup.choice: The expression leads to an error.

li.p: For the function call below, what is the type of the value returned?

choicegroup.choice: The expression leads to an error.

li.p: In a Python program, you can have a variable named return, e.g., return = 5.
A function is an example of decomposition but not abstraction.
The dictionary {'a':'1', 'b':'2', 'c': '3'} has a mapping of string:int
In a bisection search, the number of points to be examined is reduced by one each iteration.
The sort method of list has a side effect.
In Python, assignment can change the value of an object.
